schema:
  fields: 4
    - ts: type=timestamp[ms, tz=UTC], nullable
    metadata: ["path": "ts"]
    - duration: type=duration[ms], nullable
          metadata: ["path": "duration"]
    - ts_rep: type=list<item: timestamp[ms, tz=UTC], nullable>, nullable
        metadata: ["path": "ts_rep"]
    - duration_rep: type=list<item: duration[ms], nullable>, nullable
              metadata: ["path": "duration_rep"]
